snippet: The cultural arm of a real estate company, Brookfield Office Properties, spends more than $3 million a year at its North American office buildings, staging free performances and exhibitions.
abstract: Cultural arm of the real estate company Brookfield Office Properties spends more than $3 million a year staging free performances and exhibitions in the public spaces of the office buildings it operates in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The cultural arm of a real estate company, Brookfield Office Properties, spends more than $3 million a year at its North American office buildings, staging free performances and exhibitions.

headline.seo: Brookfield Office Properties’ Free Arts Programs
headline.main: Purveyors of Office Space and Lively Arts
headline.print_headline: Purveyors of Office Space and Lively Arts
